attributes.action: Remove the Knighthood of Sir Fred Goodwin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir Fred Goodwin received his knighthood for services to banking. He has brought RBS to it's knees and lost millions of pounds of staff pensioners shareholders and pension fund money. He has now done a great disservice to banking.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Honours Committee.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
